adjective.description: (of a person or their behavior) tending to attract attention because of their exuberance, confidence, and stylishness.
examples: she is outgoing and flamboyant, continuously talking and joking

adjective.description: Of or denoting a style of French Gothic architecture marked by wavy flame-like tracery and ornate decoration.

origin: Late 19th century: probably a noun use of the French adjective flamboyant blazing (see flamboyant).
